title: r/AmITheA**hole My Abusive Foster Mom Wants My $50,000. Should I Give It To Her?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP tragically lost his parents, so he gets put into the foster care system. He forms a close bond with a foster mom, who later dies and leaves OP $50,000. The next foster mom finds out about OP's money and starts pressuring OP to give her all of his money. OP thinks that maybe he should because the new foster mom is giving him a home, so he feels like he owes her. Is he the butthole for holding out?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
